text: The Millennium Falcon is a starship from the Star Wars fictional universe. It is seen in the original and sequel trilogy movies and many books, games, toys, and other things. ==Creation== The Millennium Falcon was first made for the movie Star Wars: A New Hope by Industrial Light & Magic (ILM). Joe Johnston made models to redesign the Falcon in four weeks and the sound effect was made by Ben Burtt. ==Related pages== *X-Wing Fighter *TIE fighter ==References== ==Other websites== *Intricate Illustrations of Star Wars Spacecraft Cutouts Reveal Their Inner Mechanics by Leah Pellegrini April 23, 2016 Category:Star Wars
title: Millennium Falcon
